author: David Aaro
title: Coronavirus infections in the US surpass 400000 mark after suffering deadliest day yet - Fox News
description: The number of positive coronavirus cases in the U.S. jumped past 400,000 Wednesday – just a day after the country saw its deadliest day yet.
content:
